story.text: Here we list pages that are in the site's recycler. Pages appear here either because they have been deleted, or forked over.
Pages in the recycler can be permanently removed by using the (x). Pages can be recovered by opening them, and forking them back into the site.
Here we describe the purpose of the plugin and include a sample.
